column4: anyone get an ipod to work with ubuntu?  Mine doenst work, I get usb 2-1.1: device descriptor read/64, error -71.. I tried installing gtkpod and it still wont see it
: does this happens only with ipods or with any usb interface?
usb works great for mice and keydrives, but it doesnt detect the ipod as a mass storage device, I just get that usb error
: mmm don't know, I'm on breezy and I don't have any ipod at hand so...
